name: Chunky Glass Tumblers
description:
The perfect glass for summer cocktails. 

Sold as a set of four. 11cm high. By French Country Collections.

name: The Great Surfing Memory Game
description:
"Surfing is a fascinating sport with a long history and a rich and vibrant culture. All of this stuffed in a box creates an easy to learn memory game that is fun fun fun!"

Ages 3-99. Players 2+. 
Each box contains 50 cards, instructions and fact guide. 
Packaging measures 14.5cm high, 9.5cm wide, 7cm deep. 

Surfing is only fun in unpolluted waters. Therefore this game is produced using environmentally sustainable and eco friendly materials: 100% recycled cardboard, plantation grown pine,  FSC certified paper and soy based inks .

name: Stripe Cotton Throws
description:
Gorgeous heavy weight cotton throw by French Country Collections. Classic beige or blue and ivory stripes with tassels, these throws are perfect to take outside with you on cooler summer nights. 

130cmWx170cmL

name: Cotton canvas cushions
description:
These cushions are so versatile - they are a heavy weight cotton canvas so you can pop them outside for Summer lounging. A soft colour palate of blues, creams and taupes will work well in a range of interior schemes.  

Zip closure, polyester inner. 60 x 40cm. 

They co-ordinate well with the French Country stripe cotton throws. 

Sale ! Were $59 now $45 each, two available.

name: Orla Kiely Beach Towel
description:
Orla Kiely's fun stem jacquard beach towels are an essential for any trip to the beach!

100% Cotton, 450gsm 
Dimensions (cm): 90 x 170
Colour: Aqua and clementine.

name: Icecream Sundae Glasses
description:
Gorgeous old-fashioned style icecream sundae glasses. 
16.5cm high.

name: Ashley & Co Candle Bubbles & Polka Dots
description:
WAXED PERFUME

Introducing a new product from NZ company Ashley & Co. WAXED PERFUME is as it sounds; 100% Natural wax mixed with their stunning signature scents!

Waxed perfume is individually hand poured using 100% natural wax, unbleached cotton wick, hand placed, hand glued... or in other words, is a genuine hand made product of New Zealand.

–Floral Rose, Soft Powdery Musk

Kid around? Fresh garden rose mixed with soft powdery musk smells like a baby-out- of-the-bath. Buyer beware a craving for bed time stories and milk and cookies could result.

207g

40 - 45 hrs burn time

name: Native Bird Stamp Sets
description:
These gorgeous NZ native bird stamps are designed by Tofutree, which is a group of young artists and designers that graduated from Elam School of Fine Arts and School of Architecture design, at the University of Auckland, New Zealand. They have come together to create beautiful and meaningful things that matter to our life! 

Select from Tuis (blue packaging) or Fantails (red packaging) 
Each box measures 11 x 11cm.

name: Flying Tuis & Fantails
description:
Set of five bird wall decals. Fold the wings out to create a 3D effect and gorgeous shadows. Perfect for sending overseas as they are packaged flat and are very light! 
Packaged measurements: 41 x 29cms. 
The birds are made of vinyl and each measure approximate 15cm wide. 

Made in New Zealand. Select from: 

Black Tuis 
White Tuis
Black Fantails
White Fantails

name: Coral Form by Peggy Ericson
description:
Peggy Ericson works from The Aviary and creates beautiful ceramic sculptures, lamps, garden and wall art. 

The coral form is inspired by her love of the ocean and all things coastal. Paper clay. 20cm high. 
Made in Gisborne, New Zealand. 

Price includes postage and packaging New Zealand wide. 
Large glass dome is by French Country Collections and is also available, please select from the drop down list. The dimensions are 390mm high. Wooden base is 390mm round. 

About the artist: 
Peggy's work is largely organic, simple and responds to her observations and surroundings. Her work is sculptural rather than functional. She uses natural oxides and slips as opposed to glazes. Texture and the language of the clay itself are her trademarks.

name: Raku Fired Vessel by Peggy Ericson
description:
Raku Fired Vessel by Peggy Ericson

Peggy Ericson works from The Aviary and creates beautiful ceramic sculptures, lamps, garden and wall art.

Clay. 10cm high. Not suitable for water. 
Made in Gisborne, New Zealand.

Price includes postage and packaging New Zealand wide. 
Photographed with Coral Form, also by Peggy Ericson. 

About the artist: 
Peggy's work is largely organic, simple and responds to her observations and surroundings. Her work is sculptural rather than functional. She uses natural oxides and slips as opposed to glazes. Texture and the language of the clay itself are her trademarks.

name: Ceramic Lamp by Peggy Ericson
description:
Peggy Ericson works from The Aviary and creates beautiful ceramic sculptures, lamps, garden and wall art. 

25cm high,  x 24cm wide,  x 11cm deep. 
Paper clay. 20cm high. 
Made in Gisborne, New Zealand. 


About the artist: 
Peggy's work is largely organic, simple and responds to her observations and surroundings. Her work is sculptural rather than functional. She uses natural oxides and slips as opposed to glazes. Texture and the language of the clay itself are her trademarks.

name: Pocket Mirrors
description:
These gorgeous pocket mirrors are designed by Tofutree, which is a group of young artists and designers that graduated from Elam School of Fine Arts and School of Architecture design, at the University of Auckland, New Zealand. They have come together to create beautiful and meaningful things that matter to our life!

Great stocking fillers.  8cm wide.

name: New York 500 Piece Puzzle
description:
A fantastic gift for puzzle lovers! 
500 piece jigsaw puzzle featuring the New York City street map, packaged in a cool cardboard tube, by German company 'Remember'. 
The finished puzzle measures 50 x 50cm. 

The packaged puzzle measures 21cm high x 12cm wide. 

Sale ! Were $49 now $35 x

name: Sparrow Clock
description:
A fun addition to your kitchen or child's bedroom, this wooden clock has been made in New Zealand by Crystal Ashley Designs. 

Nice and light for easy posting  (perfect to send overseas), packaged in a sturdy cardboard presentation box. 18 x 30cm. 

Requires 1 x AA battery, not included.

name: Caravan Clock
description:
A fun addition to any kitchen, caravan or home office! 
New Zealand made, this wooden clock features a gorgeous green caravan on the face. 

Nice and light for easy postage overseas. 
Requires 1 x AA battery, not included. 
By Crystal Ashley Designs. 
15cm round. 

Only 1 left x

name: Flying Kiwi Decoration
description:
Little wooden Kiwi decoration made in New Zealand. 
Packaged flat, simply slide the wings on and hang him up! 
A great Christmas decoration to post overseas too. 

Kiwi measures 12cm wide, 7cm high.

name: Wooden Stag Decoration
description:
New Zealand made wooden stag decoration by Crystal Ashley designs. 
These decorations are packaged flat, and two pieces are simply slotted together to make a gorgeous 3D decoration. 

10cm high. Twine included for hanging.

name: Native Bird Wooden Gift Tags
description:
Cute little wooden gift tags in fun bright shades. Perfect for adding to gifts, draw handles, or Christmas decorations. The back of each box has a description of each bird, which makes them perfect gifts for posting overseas. 

Choose from:
a set of 4 Fantails SOLD OUT
a set of 4 Morepork (owls) .
Each box measures 11cm x 15cm.

name: Christmas Deer
description:
This deer is too beautiful to just have on display at Christmas time. He will make a stunning centre piece on the dining room table, side board or entrance way. Post festive season, drape your jewellery around his neck or nestle him amongst your books on the bookshelf. 

Resin. 60cm high, 43cm wide. Detachable antlers.

name: Monument Decorations
description:
Very delicate silver glass Christmas decorations by '& Klevering', Amsterdam. The boxed set includes the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben and the Chrysler Building. 

The Eiffel Tower measures 12cm high.

name: Christmas Tree Dome
description:
Gorgeous glass dome decoration with a decorative Christmas tree, presents and snow inside with a mirror base. A very special Christmas decoration to add to the collection!

Dome measures 11cm high.

name: Crystal Photo Clips
description:
Gorgeous little glass and metal photo / card holders. 
These look great with name cards for dinner parties or for displaying photos, memos and invites. 

9.5cm high. French Country. 

Only 5 left in stock! More arriving in January x

name: Silver Glass Vase Set
description:
This is such a beautiful little set by French Country Collections. Three little vases sit on a glass tray. Filled with your favourite flowers this set would be lovely next to the bed or on the coffee table. 
Two of the vases could be used for tea lights x

The tray measures 18cm wide.  Everything in the photograph except the flower is included in this set.

name: Test Tube Vase
description:
Vase, beaker or jug! 
Fill with your favourite flowers or use on the table for cream (it pours well) and other condiments. 
French Country Collections. 
Glass
13cm high 8cm wide

name: Ceramic Christmas Decoration Set
description:
A beautifully packaged set of four white ceramic Christmas decorations. The set includes a deer, bunny, squirrel and angel. Keep the set for your own collection or give them as gorgeous Christmas gifts. 

The squirrel measures 5.5cm high. 

Only 1 set left x

name: Diamante Heart Decoration
description:
Diamante covered heart decoration on a white organza ribbon. Hang on door handles, the Christmas tree or tie on to gifts. 

French Country Collections
17cm high ,13cm wide

Only 2 left x

name: Donkey Money Box
description:
Extremely cute money box by French Country Collections. 
A great place to save all your spare change! 

21cm high 22cm wide 8cm wide. Resin.

name: Black Desk Lamp with Red Cord
description:
New! 
French Country Collections
Gorgeous matt black finish with vibrant red fabric cord for a pop of colour. Perfect for the office, bedroom, lounge....anywhere! Height adjustable. An E27 energy saver light bulb is required, maximum 15 watts (which will give approximately 60 watts of light) not included. 

Base: 19cm
Shade: 16cm
Maximum height: 66cm

Available in store only.

name: Mantel Clock by Thomas Kent - Black
description:
'Hotel Fleurs Noir'
A beautiful clock made by Thomas Kent Clocks. 
This clock has a felted base, requires one AA battery and comes with a 12 month warranty. Cute in the kitchen, dining, bookcase or bedroom. 

12cm high.

name: White Mesh Hanging Lanterns
description:
Beautiful and oh so simple, these little metal lanterns are ideal for entertaining indoors and out. Pop a tea light or your favourite scented candle in and enjoy!

Select from:
small: 15cm high, 9cm round, SOLD OUT
large: 19cm high, 11cm round

name: 'Dotty' Jug / Vase
description:
by French Country Collections. 
One of The Aviary's best sellers, this gorgeous ceramic jug is not only great to serve chilled water from but also makes a stunning vase.   

19.5cm high.

name: Night Time Glass Set
description:
Water jug and glass set by French Country, with 'Bonne Nuit' on the side. Perfect for the bedside table and in the guest bedroom. 
Overall height 20cm
Glass height 10cm

(I also think this would make an interesting vessel for individual serve cocktails... have them pre-made waiting in the fridge for your guests)

name: Milk Bottles
description:
These little milk bottles are fun for kid's birthday parties with colourful straws, or as bud vases. 

Sold as a set of 4. 

Small: 12cm high with white star decal

name: Paper Straws
description:
Pack of 20 paper straws in green and white. 
By Six Barrel Soda.

name: Recipe Box
description:
This recipe file box is so sweet. Beautiful floral graphics inside and out, keep it on your kitchen bench for storing all your favourite recipes in style. Featuring 8 glossy tabs, 50 fill-in recipe cards and all the categories you need including fruits and vegetables, breads and pastas and desserts.  Free printable PDF card refills available at Galison.com. 

Measures 16cm wide, 12cm high and 8.5cm deep.

name: Diamond Print Butter Dish
description:
Ceramic multi-purpose container with wooden lid. 
Ideal for butter, teabags, jewellery.....

15cm wide, 9.5cm high, 10cm deep. 

Only 1 left x

name: Pure Linen Tea Towels
description:
Extra generously sized, these ultra absorbent french inspired, 100% natural linen tea towels are finished with red or charcoal stripes. 

Hardwearing, highly absorbent and lint free, linen increases in strength when wet, making it an ideal fabric for drying dishes. Unlike cotton, this gorgeous, soft linen tea towel will improve as it ages. 

Size 70cm x 85cm.

name: Orla Kiely Cannister Set
description:
Set of 3 canister tins featuring Orla Kiely's signature prints. Handwash only. 

Fill with Christmas treats and give as gifts x

Dimensions (cm):(Largest tin) H28 x W14 x D14

name: Orla Kiely Cake Tins
description:
Set of 5 round cake tins featuring the Raised Stem design, by Orla Kiely. Tins can be nested for easy storage. Handwash only. 

Perfect for packing Christmas treats in and giving away as gifts. 

Dimensions (cm) LARGEST TIN :H15 x W27 x D27

name: Butterfly Place Cards
description:
Let your guests find their seats with these exquisite place cards. Add a name and slip onto a glass (or bottle) for the perfect finishing touch! 
Beautiful for weddings and special dinner parties. 

Set of 10. The butterflies measure 11cm wide.

name: Glass Dome
description:
by French Country Collections

Perfect for displaying your favourite objects - candles, ornaments and art pieces. They also look fantastic on wooden boards covering cheese! 

23cm high, 17cm wide x

name: Bird Cage / Plant Holder / Candle Holder
description:
Stunning large metal bird cage by French Country Collections, with removable tray and hinged door. Fill with herbs, candles, flowers or even put a light bulb in it! Anything that takes your fancy.  

Dark grey. 
55cmWx28cmDx62cmH

Sale! Was $135, now $95.

name: MOR Candied Vanilla Almond Scented Candle
description:
Travel on a sensory journey of joyful decadence with  MOR Emporium Scented Candles. Light up your world and breathe in heavenly aromas. Be visually moved by the luxurious glass vessel wrapped in inspired seventeenth century art and gilded with 24 carat gold. 184gms. 

Candle Ingredients and Key Benefits
- Soy Wax for a cleaner longer burn
- 100 % cotton, lead free wick
- Candle burn time - up to 40 hours
- 24 carat gold decal
- Candle presented in a stunning glass vessel
- Excellent scent throw

The Fragrance
Candied Almonds blended with Sugar Blossom are decadently layered upon a base of smooth Vanilla to create this sweetly sophisticated fragrance

name: Kashmir Petals Argan Oil Hand Cream
description:
Beautifully packaged Correspondence Argan Oil hand cream (75mls) by Mor Cosmetics, Australia, in the romantic floral scent of Kashmir petals.

More info about Argan Oil handcream: 
A rich formulation of Argan Oil assists in premature ageing and deeply moisturises, whilst a combination of Artichoke Leaf Extract, Shea Butter and Rooibos Extract provides high anti-ageing properties as well as regenerates, rejuvenates and smoothes hands.

INGREDIENTS & Key Benefits 
- All key ingredients are organic 
- Contains Argan Oil for deep moisturisation and assists in premature ageing 
- Contains Artichoke Leaf and Rooibos extracts with anti-oxidant and anti-ageing benefits 
- Contains moisturising Shea Butter to smooth and keep skin supple 
- Contains Cabbage Rose Extract that regenerates and soothes

name: Tangelo Grapefruit Argan Oil Handcream
description:
Beautifully packaged Argan Oil hand cream (75ml) by Mor Cosmetics, Australia,  in the sweet citrus scent of tangelo grapefruit

More information on Argan Oil hand cream: 
Like the unravellings of time , take a moment and enrich your hands with this fragrant and nourishing Hand Cream. A rich formulation of Argan Oil assists in premature ageing and deeply moisturises, whilst a combination of Artichoke Leaf Extract, Shea Butter and Rooibos Extract provides high anti-ageing properties as well as regenerates, rejuvenates and smoothes hands.

INGREDIENTS & Key Benefits 
- All key ingredients are organic 
- Contains Argan Oil for deep moisturisation and assists in premature ageing 
- Contains Artichoke Leaf and Rooibos extracts with anti-o xidant and anti-ageingbenefits 
- Contains moisturising Shea Butter to smooth and keep skin supple 
- Contains Cabbage Rose Extract that regenerates and soothes

name: Pepperberry Cardamom Argan Oil Handcream
description:
Beautifully packaged Argan Oil handcream (75mls) by Mor Cosmetics Australia,  in the sweet spicy scent of pepperberry cardamom, all packaged in a beautiful reusable tin.

More information about Argan Oil handcream:

Like the unravellings of time , take a moment and enrich your hands with this fragrant and nourishing Hand Cream. A rich formulation of Argan Oil assists in premature ageing and deeply moisturises, whilst a combination of Artichoke Leaf Extract, Shea Butter and Rooibos Extract provides high anti-ageing properties as well as regenerates, rejuvenates and smoothes hands.

name: MOR Tangelo Grapefruit Gift Set
description:
MOR Correspondence "Sphere Adorn" Duet in Tangelo Grapefruit gift set. 

This gorgeous gift set contains an Argan Oil hand cream (75ml), and a triple milled soap bar (165gms) in the sweet citrus scent of tangelo grapefruit, all packaged in a beautiful reusable tin. 

More information on Argan Oil hand cream: 
Like the unravellings of time , take a moment and enrich your hands with this fragrant and nourishing Hand Cream. A rich formulation of Argan Oil assists in premature ageing and deeply moisturises, whilst a combination of Artichoke Leaf Extract, Shea Butter and Rooibos Extract provides high anti-ageing properties as well as regenerates, rejuvenates and smoothes hands.

Only two left in stock x

name: MOR Pepperberry Cardamom Gift Set
description:
MOR Correspondence "Sphere Exquisite" Duet in Pepperberry Cardamom.

This gorgeous gift set contains an Argan Oil handcream (75mls) and triple milled soap bar (165gms) in the sweet spicy scent of pepperberry cardamom, all packaged in a beautiful reusable tin. 

More information about Argan Oil handcream: 

Like the unravellings of time , take a moment and enrich your hands with this fragrant and nourishing Hand Cream. Only 2 left in stock x

name: MOR Marshmallow Luxe Gift Set
description:
MOR "Chevron Luxe Marshmallow Duet" gift set. 

Chevron Luxe with the mesmerising fragrance of marshmallow in a hydrating hand and body wash (500mls)  and moisturising hand and body milk (500mls), all packaged in a fun chevron printed cardboard gift box. 

The Fragrance:
Marshmallow is collectively orchestrated with Vanilla Musk and Jasmine Flower that gloriously rapture in this pretty, feminine fragrance. Sugar dipped Rose petals with White Carnation and Cotton Candy play beautifully to create a deliciously sweet perfume .

Only one left! x

name: Ashley & Co Candle Tui & Kahili
description:
WAXED PERFUME

Introducing a new product from NZ company Ashley & Co. WAXED PERFUME is as it sounds; 100% Natural wax mixed with their stunning signature scents!

Waxed perfume is individually hand poured using 100% natural wax, unbleached cotton wick, hand placed, hand glued... or in other words, is a genuine hand made product of New Zealand.
Wild Ginger, Lily

Like sweet nectar enticing the Tui, notes of wild spreading GINGER and delicate LILY will have you scouring the native flora for this alluring scent. 

–

207g

40 - 45 hrs burn time

name: Ashley & Co Candle Blossom & Gilt
description:
WAXED PERFUME
Introducing a new product from NZ company Ashley & Co. WAXED PERFUME is as it sounds; 100% Natural wax mixed with their stunning signature scents!

Waxed perfume is individually hand poured using 100% natural wax, unbleached cotton wick, hand placed, hand glued... or in other words, is a genuine hand made product of New Zealand.

Costa Rican Tuberose, Wild Jasmine
Give fresh flowers: Costa Rican tuberose and wild jasmine create the ultimate bouquet but lasts longer than it s fresh petaled contemporaries.

–

207g

40 - 45 hrs burn time

name: 'Blossom & Gilt' Home Perfume
description:
by Ashley & Co

Give fresh flowers: COSTA RICAN TUBEROSE and WILD JASMINE create the ultimate bouquet – but lasts longer than it’s fresh petaled contemporaries.

Each 265ml bottle will last minimum 6 months and 2.5 years unopened. As with any perfume, keep it out of direct sunlight.
265ml. 12 Reed Sticks included. Made in NZ. 


It’s no ordinary air freshener; Ashley & Co’s home perfumes are not only environmentally friendly but functional and aesthetically cool. Simply allow the perfume to travel up the porous wicks and gently diffuse in the air. The long lasting formulations have been designed to complement their environment, suit ones mood and attitude - choose one to fit.

name: 'Bubbles & Polkadots' Home Perfume
description:
by Ashley & Co

Kid around? Fresh GARDEN ROSE mixed with SOFT POWDERY MUSK smells like a baby-out-of-the-bath. Buyer beware a craving for bed time stories and milk and cookies could result.

Each 265ml bottle will last minimum 6 months and 2.5 years unopened. As with any perfume, keep it out of direct sunlight.
265ml. 12 Reed Sticks included. Made in NZ. 

It’s no ordinary air freshener; Ashley & Co’s home perfumes are not only environmentally friendly but functional and aesthetically cool. Simply allow the perfume to travel up the porous wicks and gently diffuse in the air. The long lasting formulations have been designed to complement their environment, suit ones mood and attitude - choose one to fit.

name: 'Vine & Paisley' Home Perfume
description:
by Ashley & Co

Up there with puppies, cashmere sweaters and a pinon camp fire this earthy mix uses notes of AMBER, VANILLA and SANDALWOOD to create a feeling of warmth and security.

Each 265ml bottle will last minimum 6 months and 2.5 years unopened. As with any perfume, keep it out of direct sunlight.
265ml. 12 Reed Sticks included. Made in NZ.

Free delivery New Zealand wide on this item x

name: 'Parakeets & Pearls' Home Perfume
description:
by Ashley & Co

Remember handwritten love letter’s and dressing for dinner? No? This Old World scent of freshly picked GREEN TEA and WHITE LILIES will help bring the glamour back to modern day.

Each 265ml bottle will last minimum 6 months and 2.5 years unopened. As with any perfume, keep it out of direct sunlight.
265ml. 12 Reed Sticks included. Made in NZ. 

It’s no ordinary air freshener; Ashley & Co’s home perfumes are not only environmentally friendly but functional and aesthetically cool. Simply allow the perfume to travel up the porous wicks and gently diffuse in the air. The long lasting formulations have been designed to complement their environment, suit ones mood and attitude - choose one to fit.

name: Marble Soap Dish
description: Gorgeous little marble soap dish - also would be useful for jewellery and keeping precious items safe. By French Country Collections.

name: Eco-Lotion For Hands & Body
description:
by Ashley & Co

SOOTHERUP GONE GREEN ECO-LOTION WITH ORGANIC BORAGE OIL AND NATURAL EXTRACTS FOR YOUR HANDS AND BODY

Forget the glass dome and taxidermy of nature - preservation begins with a pestle. Created is a natural and unique rhapsody blend of Organic Borage Oil, Olive Extract And Aloe. Propagate. Pick. Grind.

Washed Up and need nourishment? Use Soother Up for healthy looking skin… it’s like bottled comfort for your hands and body.
Without: Sulphates, Parabens, Mineral Oils, Colourings Or Synthetic Fragrance.
Gone Green Range Fragrance Certified 100% Natural by Ecocert

500ml 16.9 FL OZ. Made in NZ.

name: Eco-Wash For Hands & Body
description:
by Ashley & Co

ECO-WASH WITH ORGANIC BORAGE OIL AND NATURAL EXTRACTS
FOR YOUR HANDS AND BODY

Forget the glass dome and taxidermy of nature - preservation begins with a pestle. Created is a natural and unique rhapsody blend of Organic Borage Oil, Olive Extract And Aloe. Propagate. Pick. Grind.

An Earthly purifying formulation - Wash Up Gone Green for your hands and body smoothly removes surface and daily impurities without depleting your skins natural moisture… creating the ultimate cleansing experience.

Without: Sulphates, Parabens, Mineral Oils, Colourings Or Synthetic Fragrance.

Gone Green Range Fragrance Certified 100% Natural by Ecocert
500ml 16.9 FL OZ. Made in NZ.

name: 'Blossom & Gilt' Hand Wash
description:
by Ashley & Co

Give fresh flowers: COSTA RICAN TUBEROSE and WILD JASMINE create the ultimate bouquet – but lasts longer than it’s fresh petaled contemporaries

WITH NATURAL ANTISEPTICS
FOR YOUR HANDS
A special combination of natural antiseptic extracts, like grape fruit seed and aloe, comes beautifully bottled inspiring people to wash their hands keeping everyone healthier. Each blend is lightly fragranced with Ashley & Co’s signature scents - it’s the gift of health.

PH balanced and soap free
500ml 16.9 FL OZ. Made in NZ.

name: Blossom & Gilt Top Up by Ashley & Co
description:
TopUp by Ashley & Co

With Natural Antiseptics

For your hands

A special combination of natural antiseptics, like grapefruit seed and aloe, comes beautifully bottled inspiring people to wash their hands keeping everyone healthier. Each blend is lightly fragranced with Ashley & Co’s signature scents – it’s the gift of health. 

The scent: Kid around? Fresh GARDEN ROSE mixed with SOFT POWDERY MUSK smells like a baby-out-of-the-bath. Buyer beware a craving for bed time stories and milk and cookies could result.

1 ltr (fills up the bottles of Wash Up twice!)
New Zealand made.

name: Fantail Coin Purse
description:
Gorgeous little fantail shaped coin purse covered in beads and sequins. Never lose your spare change with one of these in your bag! 
By Caroline Mitchell Designs
12 x 10cm

name: 'Vintage Attic' Wallet
description:
This wallet is quite out there! On the front are printed images of stag heads, lamps, old scissors, paintings and anything else you might find in an old attic. On the reverse are three gold frames stitched onto tan, featuring beautiful illustrations of ducks, owls and swans with captions underneath each image. 

Internal features: zipped coin pocket, 4 card slots and 2 large pockets for notes and receipts (and some pretty crazy lining!)

This wallet measures 20 x 10cm. Vinyl.

name: Embossed Leather Wrap Purse
description:
Beautifully soft leather wrap purse by Caroline Mitchell Designs. 
Ideal for passports, notebooks, as a wallet or generally keeping your belongings safe in your bag! 

Purse measures 19cm wide by 12.5cm high.

name: Embossed Leather Zip Purse
description:
Embossed leather zip purses by Caroline Mitchell Designs. 
They are slightly padded so will keep your belongings protected. Ideal for cameras, phones and IPods as well as cards, coins and makeup. 

Available in black with a white bird, and white with a black bird. 

Each purse measures 20cm wide and 10cm high .

SPECIAL PRE-CHRISTMAS PRICE: 
Select from the following options in the drop down list: 
1 for $19 (normal price) or
2 for $25!

name: Botanica Travel Set
description:
A beautifully soft leather travel set, including a wallet and luggage tag. Both items are presented in a co-ordinating Botanica printed gift box. 

The luggage tag features contrasting prints, an adjustable strap and hidden address label. 
The wallet features contrasting prints, an elastic strap and 5 internal pockets. One of the pockets has a clear plastic covering, perfect for keeping tickets visible. The wallet measures 9 x 14cm. 

SALE! Was $85 now $59 x

name: Mooi Leather Tote Bags
description:
This tote is the perfect companion for your daytime dallying. She is roomy, simple and chic. A pleasure to carry on your shoulder or in-hand, this bag makes a striking statement.
• magnetic button snap closure 
• dual flat shoulder straps
• genuine leather with ‘hair-on’ front panel
• inside: one zip and two open pockets
• H:42cm L:40cm W:10cm

Select from brown or black & white.

name: Evening Purse with Gold Owl Studs
description:
This bag by Stella & Gemma is absolutely gorgeous! 
Features: 

-Front zip pocket
-Two main zipped compartments
-Back zipped pocket
-Pocket in between main compartments for easy phone access
-Large tassel
-Detachable should chain strap
-Zipped internal pockets
-Internal cell phone pocket

Creamy grey colour, gold finish owl studs and hardware. 
Measures 26cm wide, 20cm high.

name: Mooi Shoulder Bag & Clutch - Hazelnut
description:
This maxi pouch can be used as an evening clutch, shoulder bag,  Ipad sleeve or super sized make-up purse when travelling. She is super handy and makes a wonderful gift for those who love oversized accessories.
• zip closure with detachable wrist band, tassel and sling
• genuine leather in versatile tan colour.  
• H:23cm L:30cm

name: Mooi Shoulder Bag & Clutch - Black & White
description:
This maxi pouch can be used as an evening clutch, shoulder bag,  Ipad sleeve or super sized make-up purse when travelling. She is super handy and makes a wonderful gift for those who love oversized accessories.
• zip closure with detachable wrist band, tassel and sling

name: Troop Signature Body Bag
description:
Troop Signature Body Bag 19 x 26 x 10cm 

Retro styling and cute as  button, this stylish body bag has vintage leather trim and brass buckels. Made of super strong canvas and genuine Italian leather. 

External featrues: 
The main compartment has top zip fastening. Front flap has double magnetic snap closures, which covers an easy access pocket. Also there is a clear ID window with leather frame on the back. Zipped rear pocket. Adjustable shoulder strap. 

Internal: 
Fully lined with water resisitant monogrammed lining. Internal secure zip pocket. Phone pouch ideal for an iPhone / smart phone. Small slip in pocket.

name: Bianca Lorenne 'Monogram' Eurocases
description:
Examples of historic, embroidered monograms adorn these 100% linen European pillowcases.  From ancient Greek coins to royal linen, monograms have a long and rich history which has inspired this exquisite design. 

65 x 65cm. By Bianca Lorenne Fine Linens. 
These make really special engagement and wedding presents x

name: Bianca Lorenne Silk Pillow
description:
Bianca Lorenne's divine silk filled pillows gently cradle your head allowing you to breathe easier and keep your head cool.  Filled with hand stretched layers of grade A mulberry silk floss wrapped around a polyfibre core.  Delicate and soft! 

Your silk pillow will last a lifetime if proper care is taken:
-always use a removable cover to protect the silk product from dirt and stains
-air outdoors every 3 months for 2 hours and up to a maximum of 3 hours. 
This should be all that is needed to keep your silk product fresh and clean. Silk fibres do not absorb moisture or odours, avoiding the necessity to wash your inner and freshen it up.

name: Bianca Lorenne Linen Eurocases, Ivory
description:
A beautiful design in Bianca Lorenne's popular Crellini linen product range. This eurocase features an elegant centrally placed intricate embroidered design. Ivory. 65 x 65cm. 

Mix and match these stunning pillowcases with other linens to create a luxurious yet easy care look for your bed this summer. 

Price is per pillowcase.

name: Raw Silk & Velvet Cushion Covers
description:
Beautiful, tactile and extremely versatile, these raw silk and velvet cushion covers are perfect for pairing with other patterned cushions or layering with other textures. 

Select from caramel velvet (as in first photograph) and milk chocolate coloured raw silk. 
Both styles are 50cm square with zip closures.
Made by The Aviary.

name: Bianca Lorenne Peacock Eurocases
description:
By Bianca Lorenne Fine Linens

A vibrant floral print of peacocks, birds and butterflies perched amongst foliage. Shades of green, carmine red, ochre, teal and duck egg on a beige base make up these stunning European pillowcases. Finished with pleated edging. 
Same fabric front and back .
Button closure. 65 x 65cm.
Matching comforter available x

name: Aura Bold Red Cushions
description:
Add some real punch to your lounge or bedroom with these bold cushions by Aura Home, Australia, 

Select from the red dipped design which is half red, half linen, or the bold geometric red and linen stripe pattern. 

Both designs have zip closures and polyester inners. 50 x 50cm. 
They co-ordinate perfectly with the French Country red and white zig zag cotton throw.

description:
These gorgeous super soft 100% cotton throws are perfect for the warmer nights. Ideal for the end of the bed or couch as an extra layer. 

Choose from:

grey and white SOLD OUT
red and white  - 2 available 
green and white SOLD OUT
yellow and white
orange and white
blue and white

135 x 175cm

name: Round Floor Cushion Covers
description:
These bright and lovely round cushion covers will add POP to any bed, sofa or armchair, or pile them up on the floor for relaxed lounging.  Jewel colored cotton fabrics with equally as brilliant embroidery create a stunning effect. The round shape acts to draw the eye.

60cm round, zip closure. Fill with anything you have at hand - stuffing, old pillows or blankets, fabric off cuts, beans..... 

Select from charcoal, green or red.

description:
By Bianca Lorenne Fine Linens

Made in Italy from the softest 100% combed pure cotton percale, 800 thread count/10cm2 and perfumed with a gorgeous white musk scent. Flanged pillowcases and eurocases close with elegant buttons on the reverse.

Ajour is a classic and delicate hemstitch design. 

These sheets are the ultimate in luxury and would make beautiful wedding gifts. Please advise if they are a wedding gift and The Aviary will wrap them accordingly! x

King Single Flat Sheet 200 x 265cm
King Single Fitted Sheet 110 x 205 x40cm
Queen Flat Sheet 250 x 265cm

King Fitted Sheet 170 x 205 x 40cm
Super King Flat Sheet

SALE! 40% off. Was $179 now $107.40 x

name: East Coast Tourism Print
description:
Issued by the New Zealand Government Tourism Department in the 1960s, this gorgeous print urging people to visit Gisborne and it's surrounds for a relaxing holiday is the perfect gift for ex-pats or fans of the East Coast. 

Image size: 155 x 252mm. 
Framed size: 330 x 430mm. White box frame with white mat 

"Images are printed on 192 gsm Archival Matt photo stock using an 8 Colour  Photo printer & K3 Ultrachrome inks

Epson UltraChrome K3™ ink technology represents a turning point in the history of inkjet printing. Epson's all new 8-color ink set incorporates three unique levels of black, which along with new color pigment technology, dramatically improves both color and black and white prints. 
Imagine producing archival prints with amazing color fidelity, gloss level, and scratch resistance, while providing stable colors from the moment prints exit the printer.

Epson UltraChrome K3 ink has improved print permanence characteristics that provide lightfastness ratings of up to 108 years  for color and over 200 years for black and white under rigorous industry accepted display conditions."

name: Mountain Daisy Tourism  Print
description:
"Mountain Daisy, Southern Alps, New Zealand"
In the 1930s the Government Tourist Dept used these images to entice tourists to visit New Zealand, and are now reproduced to match the original highly collectable posters. 

Available :

or

name: Lake Waikaremoana Tourism Print
description:
This poster of Lake Waikaremoana was originally released by the New Zealand Government Tourist Dept in 1950, used to entice tourists to visit New Zealand and explore all that it had to offer. 

Unfortunately the Lake House no longer exists, but Lake Waikaremoana (meaning "Sea Of Rippling Waters") is still a favourite fishing, camping and tramping spot for locals and tourists alike. 

This print is the ideal gift for those who love the area! Perfect for posting overseas too. 

Currently available as an archival print on A4 and A2 mat paper. A4:image measures 24 x 15cm
A2: image measures 52.5 x 32.5cm
A2 Framed print measures: 64 x 44cm SOLD

name: Iconic New Zealand Tourism Print - Wairakei
description:
From the 1930s to the late 1960s the Government Tourist Dept used these images to entice tourists to visit New Zealand, and are now reproduced to match the original highly collectable posters.

Collect your favourite New Zealand holiday spots or post to friends and family overseas x

A4 unframed print on high quality archival mat paper in a protective clear plastic sleeve.

name: Framed Poverty Bay Club Print
description:
The Poverty Bay Club is in Gisborne, New Zealand. Since its formation in 1874 the Poverty Bay Club and its buildings have weathered many social and environmental storms including four fires, three earthquakes, and the introduction of women into its inner folds.

A fine example of late Nineteenth Century provincial architecture, the Poverty Bay Club building is an intrinsically valuable landmark in New Zealand’s most eastern city. The building, erected in 1898 is the work of noted local architect William Peter Finneran.

The Gentleman’s Club itself was formed by Dr William Nesbitt, an Irishman, a doctor, a coroner and Gisborne’s Resident Magistrate.

For over 120 years, the Poverty Bay Club membership swelled and shrank in size reflecting the events of the day. It is interesting to note women were not allowed to become members until 1988.

This gorgeous framed print is a lovely souvenir for those who have fond memories of the building! 

It measures 34 x 43cm, black box frame with white mount.

name: Art Deco Tourism Print - Maori Cheif
description:
In the 1930s the Government Tourist Dept used these images to entice tourists to visit New Zealand, and are now reproduced to match the original highly collectable posters. 

Unframed A4 size print

description:

Print size 11” x 14”, Archival print,  Protective clear sleeve

These make really lovely gifts to post overseas x

name: 2014 Quo Vadis Diary 'Note 24'
description: Features -13 months, December to December -8 AM to 9 PM schedule -An entire page for making notes each week -Annual planning calendars for 2014 and 2015 -85g, acid-free and pH neutral paper -Crisp two colour print - grey and red -super smooth paper -Detachable note book -Maps -Sewn binding, lays flat when open -Tear-off corner opens to week in progress -16 x 24cm ABOUT QUO VADIS DIARIES In 1952, a French doctor, F.G. Beltrami, invented the "one week on two pages" planner format. Up until that time, appointment books were simply "day per page" diaries . Dr. Beltrami, feeling cramped and unable to plan ahead his week, month or year, took a sheet of paper and created his own personal management system. He made his first diary by stamping a grid on the white pages of a notebook. This modern diary is a combination of a calendar and a journal 1962 Prize of Honor Along with the DS by Citroën and the IBM typewriter, the Quo Vadis diary was selected to receive a Prize of Honour as one of the greatest products of the 20th century in the Louvre Museum.

name: 2014 Quo Vadis Diary 'Minister'
description: Features -13 months, December to December -8 AM to 9 PM schedule -Annual planning calendars for 2014 and 2015 -85g, acid-free and pH neutral paper -Crisp two color print - grey and red -Super smooth paper -Removable note book -Receipts & Payments pocket -Maps -Sewn binding, lays flat when open -Tear-off corner opens to week in progress -Room for notes, emails and phone numbers for each week ABOUT QUO VADIS DIARIES In 1952, a French doctor, F.G. Beltrami, invented the "one week on two pages" planner format. Up until that time, appointment books were simply "day per page" diaries . Dr. Beltrami, feeling cramped and unable to plan ahead his week, month or year, took a sheet of paper and created his own personal management system. He made his first diary by stamping a grid on the white pages of a notebook. This modern diary is a combination of a calendar and a journal 1962 Prize of Honor Along with the DS by Citroën and the IBM typewriter, the Quo Vadis diary was selected to receive a Prize of Honour as one of the greatest products of the 20th century in the Louvre Museum.
